thread.title: Amitabh Bachchan birthday: Superstar speaks to the media on 73rd birthday (Full Video)
thread.title_full: Amitabh Bachchan birthday: Superstar speaks to the media on 73rd birthday (Full Video)

author: Shweta Parande
title: Amitabh Bachchan birthday: Superstar speaks to the media on 73rd birthday (Full Video)
text:
Amitabh Bachchan birthday: Superstar speaks to the media on 73rd birthday (Full Video) By Shweta Parande on October 11, 2015 at 11:38 PM Comments 
Bollywoodâ€™s legendary superstar Amitabh Bachchan was born on October 11, 1942, and celebrated his 73rd birthday today. Bachchan spoke to the media on Sunday at Jalsa, one of his residences in Juhu, Mumbai, where thousands of fans gather to meet him every Sunday as a ritual. 
The actor did not have any plans for a grand celebration but just wanted to be with his family. He spoke about the importance of his family and well wishers and how lucky he was to have them by his side on every birthday and every day. 
The actor thanked god and his fans for all the blessings and affection showered upon him. He also thanked the media and said that their presence every year on his birthday encourages him to do better in life. He interestingly said that since he publishes posts about his life every night on social media, he feels he is a journalist himself. 
The legend also said that he sought the blessings of his late parents in the morning at his residence Pratiksha, and that he wished to live longer. Watch the full video of Amitabh Bachchan speaking to the media at Jalsa and answers questions. 
  11, 2015 11:40 PM Topics:
